column4: does anyone know how to set up wireless through gui? i would like to do this on a server install
iwconfig to associated the essid, but you still have to do all the ifconfig stuff. there is also apparently a networkmanager command line utility (or you could ssh -X and use the gui)
ifconfig seems to work completely fine while connected on eth1, i tho need it on wlan... thing is i don't even see it appear at all in ifconfig when i check... this is a server install so no gui
